demo.echo.v1.embedding_text: Echo back user text, repeat message, test tool call, quick sanity check.

demo.storage.scan.v1.embedding_text: Scan device storage, find junk, summarize cleanup opportunities, cache scan, temporary files scan, free up space.
demo.storage.scan.v1.guidance: Use to simulate a storage scan. Args: { "depth": 3 } (optional).

demo.url.open.v1.embedding_text: Open website, browse url, visit a page, open link, search online.
demo.url.open.v1.guidance: Use to open a website. Args: { "url": "<URL>" }. If user gives a loose query, convert it to a search URL.

demo.ocr.image.v1.embedding_text: Extract text from images, OCR, read screenshot, copy text from photo, recognize characters.
demo.ocr.image.v1.guidance: Use for OCR on image attachments. Args: { "files": ["{{attachments.<id>.path}}"] }.

demo.playlist.open.v1.embedding_text: Play IPTV streams, open m3u playlist, m3u8 link, streaming playlist url.
demo.playlist.open.v1.guidance: Use when user provides a URL ending in .m3u or .m3u8. Args: { "url": "<M3U_URL>" }.
